Nightlight.

Nighlight was torn in two, she didnt like to leave Rodimus beh=
ind but she didnt like to be close of Magmatron and Saberback. She finally =
answer "How did you find me? I... i cannot contact any body. Some thing is =
blocking my comlink... Besides... I cannot leave my husband behind... Its R=
odimus... He has changed so much, its almost as if he were other person"

A=
ll the tension, the fear and harsh conditions that she was endured all that=
 time was taking the toll on her phisically and mentally.
